title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Instructional Design Patterns for Online Scientific Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental science concepts and ability to use online learning tools
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: They can analyze and interpret scientific experimental data in an online environment by applying learning design patterns.
They can strengthen the ability to integrate science theory-experiment-projects through LMS-based learning activities.
They can complete science research projects (team/individual) within six months using a phased approach of learning design patterns.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
